mapper.select: select id, user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, create_time, update_time from lihao.jd_plantBean where id = #{id}
select id, user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, create_time, update_time from lihao.jd_plantBean limit #{offset}, #{limit}

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from lihao.jd_plantBean where user_md5 = #{userMd5}
insert.if: insert into lihao.jd_plantBean(user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, create_time, update_time) values (#{userMd5}, #{uniqueId}, #{name}, #{ip}, #{count}, #{todaycount}, #{todayEffectcount}, #{userStatus}, #{userTodaystatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

mapper.update:
update lihao.jd_plantBean
user_md5 = #{userMd5},
unique_id = #{uniqueId},
name = #{name},
ip = #{ip},
count = #{count},
todaycount = #{todaycount},
today_effectcount = #{todayEffectcount},
user_status = #{userStatus},
user_todaystatus = #{userTodaystatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
